sentences.english: You must not discriminate between people employed in the same firm.
sentences.chinese: 你對待同一公司的僱員不可厚此薄彼。

sentences.english: She tried not to show preference in her treatment of the children in her care.
sentences.chinese: 她對待她所照顧的孩子儘可能不厚此薄彼。

sentences.english: Procedural methods that are not impartial are also insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 厚此薄彼之議事方法，不足取也。

sentences.english: On a local parent-child forum , most participants said they will try to strike a balance.
sentences.chinese: 在上海一家上，許多參與討論者都說不能厚此薄彼。

sentences.english: A teacher should not discriminate between students.
sentences.chinese: 教師不應對學生厚此薄彼。

sentences.english: So we can't separate his creation in terms of the different themes.
sentences.chinese: 不能基於題材分野就將之割裂開來甚至厚此薄彼。
